title: Chu beram ven zan laiah chuan
lyrics:
Chu beram ven zan laiah chuan,
Van hla ropui takin a lo thang;
A thunnawn chu lawmin a khat,
Angel-ho ten chu hla chu an sa.

Chungnung berah ropui rawh se,
Lei chungah rem thu chu leng rawh se;
Tin, chatuanah thangkhawk rawh se,
Lei chunga mi lawm rawh se.

Beramputen ropui an hmu,
Ngai rawh u, enna thu chu ani;
Tluin chibai an lo buk a,
Hla mawi ropui takin a nghawr vel.

Chhandamtu, Pathian sahriak thih,
Kan bat chu pe turin a lo kal;
Lungngaih leh hrehawm chu tuarin,
Beram No, kan sual kalpuitu chu.
